docs.title: Overview
docs.text: The MK1 is a Class II Hybrid-Power VTOL.

docs.title: Servo Replacement
docs.text: While robust and waterproof, should a servo failure occur, the instructions below can be used to replace the servos. Note that servos are configured at the factory for centerpoint, limits and other parameters and cannot be swapped with a commercial servo of the same part number. For replacement servos, please contact support@echomav.com.
